summary: This is an internal FBI email chain from April 29, 2020, discussing coordination between two priority cases, one of which is the Epstein case. The email requests the creation of a spreadsheet to track remaining electronic materials to be searched and asks for completion estimates.

events.title: FBI coordination email on Epstein case materials
events.description: An internal FBI email is sent requesting the creation of a spreadsheet to track remaining electronic materials to be searched in the Epstein case and another priority case, and to get estimates on completion timelines.

keyFacts: The Epstein case was an active FBI priority as of April 2020.
The FBI was coordinating the review of electronic materials related to the Epstein case with another case.
The email requests a spreadsheet to track remaining electronic materials to be searched and completion estimates.
